name: Remote Golf
description:
A little mini-golf game in space, where you have to drive the ball to the end of the course, by taping the good input with good timing to redirect your direction of your ball.

A little game made in a private game jam by 4 persons in 8 hours :

  • Pierre Morreel : Assets art
  • Raphael Bauvin : Program
  • Léa Lenain : Assets art
  • Louis Hilaire : Level design

Controls :

  • Use the arrows on the numpad to go in all 8 directions.
